regen.absent_element: warning for deviation from mission plan with specific details
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide detailed warnings to the operator when detecting deviations from the mission plan, including the type of deviation and its magnitude.

regen.absent_element: warning for deviations from mission plan less than or equal to 10%
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a warning mechanism for notifying operators of AV deviations from the mission plan that are less than or equal to 10% from the projected flight path.
The system shall provide the capability to record specific telemetry elements.

label: TCS shall record all telemetry elements for future review and processing.
